channel.title: FLF - The Rebel Podcast
channel.description: FIGHT LAUGH FEAST PRESENTS SHOWS PROCLAIMING THE LORDSHIP OF CHRIST OVER ALL OF LIFE.
channel.itunes:author: FLF, LLC

item.title: How to Win the World: Mid-Series Review [The Rebel Podcast]
item.description:
P Nate and Pootie take a quick breather from this series eight weeks in to review the interviews and discuss what they’ve learned. There have been so many great interviews, great conversations and so many take-aways we needed to slow down to digest it all.

If you missed any of the episodes, now is your chance to catch up before the next half of the series drops!
item.author: Pastors Nate & Chris - the Rebels
item.itunes:author: Pastors Nate & Chris - the Rebels

item.title: How to Win the World: Part 7: Seek the Lost [The Rebel Podcast]
item.description: As the Rebels continue the summer series on how to win the world we turn our attention to evangelism. How can we win the world if we do not seek the lost with the transforming power of the gospel? Chris invites on returning guest and friend of the show Cory McKenna, who is an equipping evangelist with the Cross Current, to discuss how real, biblical evangelism is the heart of cultural reformation.
item.author: Pastors Nate & Chris - The Rebels
item.itunes:author: Pastors Nate & Chris - The Rebels
